content:
#21180 is a docstring change that more explicitly details the design pattern for constructing a matroid from an independence predicate.

I made this because @Junyan Xu and @Martin Dvořák both initially made wrong turns when trying to use the definition, that I think were in large part due to a lack of clarity in the docs. They have both looked at the PR and agreed that it improves matters, so it should now be good to merge.
